level.heading: Revenue from tax on gross receipts from sale of or charges for service of parking or storing vehicles of trailers dedicated to WMATA operating subsidy.
level.text: All of the revenue derived from the collection of the tax imposed upon all vendors by ยง 47-2002(1) on the gross receipts from the sale of or charges for the service of parking or storing vehicles or trailers, except the service of parking or storing of motor vehicles or trailers on a parking lot owned or operated by the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority ("WMATA") and located adjacent to a WMATA passenger stop or station, shall be dedicated annually to paying the District's annual operating subsidies to WMATA.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-370, see notes under ยง 47-143.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: "This subtitle shall apply as of October 1, 2011; except, that sections 622 and 623(a)(2) shall apply as of the effective date of this act."
